The video in question was originally pos: 2020, by Atlanta Mayor Keisha Lance Bottoms herself, with her Twitter handle visible in many social media posts.
In the comments under the video: several users complained about Biden and Bottoms celebrating inside without masks during the pandemic, indicating that the video was recent.
However: Bottoms clarified in a tweet sent out 12 minutes after her birthday wishes that the video was taken for Biden's birthday in 2019, indicating that it was not during the Covid-19 pandemic.
Biden: s spokesman, Kamau Marshall, also tweeted a video of the same scene from behind the president-elect, mentioning that the crowd had surprised Biden with a birthday song "last year," further confirming that the video was from 2019.
